reviewText: Perfect for Parents and Students in First Communion class!

I work with the PRE and RCIA programs at my Parish. I was looking for a more standard approach that would provide a foundation and review for the youth. This hit the spot. I have used it for both the youth and their parents.

I work at a Catholic church and bought this video to show to our First Communion class after our VHS copy of "A Child's First Communion" wore out.  I saw this newer version and decided to give it a try.  It contains the classic video of Fr Joe talking to little Adam about the Eucharist as well as a bunch of more modern segments that would be great showing children and groups of parents.  Fr. Joe has aged in this video but he is the same likeable, great guy.
